TASK: Craft an item of type: cookie
inventory=[{"type": "orange_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 42, "index": 19}, {"type": "golden_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "acacia_sapling", "quantity": 18, "index": 23}, {"type": "hay_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "brown_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}]
thought: To craft a cookie, I need to craft wheat first. To craft wheat, I need to place hay_block in the crafting table. I will move the hay_block from slot 24 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 24 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: cookie
inventory=[{"type": "wheat", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "hay_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "orange_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 42, "index": 19}, {"type": "golden_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "acacia_sapling", "quantity": 18, "index": 23}, {"type": "brown_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}]
thought: To craft a cookie, I need to craft wheat first. I have now crafted wheat and I will move it to an empty slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 9

inventory=[{"type": "wheat", "quantity": 9, "index": 11}, {"type": "orange_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 42, "index": 19}, {"type": "golden_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "acacia_sapling", "quantity": 18, "index": 23}, {"type": "brown_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}]
thought: To craft a cookie, I need to place 2 wheat and 1 cocoa beans in the crafting table. I will move the wheat from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1
